movie.title: Next of Kin
movie.description_intro: In a rest home for elderly people, a daughter reads her mother's diary. Soon events that are mentioned in the mother's diary begin to happen to the daughter.
movie.description_full: In a rest home for elderly people, a daughter reads her mother's diary. Soon events that are mentioned in the mother's diary begin to happen to the daughter.

movies.title: Deadlocked
movies.summary: 5 strangers become trapped in an apartment building elevator while terrifying events take place outside. The group must work together to save themselves, but this will prove especially difficult when the horror spreads through the building, and inside the elevator.
movies.description_full: 5 strangers become trapped in an apartment building elevator while terrifying events take place outside. The group must work together to save themselves, but this will prove especially difficult when the horror spreads through the building, and inside the elevator.
movies.synopsis: 5 strangers become trapped in an apartment building elevator while terrifying events take place outside. The group must work together to save themselves, but this will prove especially difficult when the horror spreads through the building, and inside the elevator.

movies.title: Carrion
movies.summary: A young woman shows up on her cousin's doorstep after a ten year absence. As dark events from the past resurface, someone in the woods follows their every move.
movies.description_full: A young woman shows up on her cousin's doorstep after a ten year absence. As dark events from the past resurface, someone in the woods follows their every move.
movies.synopsis: A young woman shows up on her cousin's doorstep after a ten year absence. As dark events from the past resurface, someone in the woods follows their every move.

movies.title: School of the Damned
movies.summary: When new teacher, Mr Middleton, leaves his inner city, London school and arrives at a British village to work at the local grammar, it doesn't take long for him to start feeling uncomfortable. The place is strange - students are extremely and unanimously well behaved, eerily unlike usual children of that age. The single difficult student is the new kid, Georgie, who is violently injured in a fight, even though the school is adamant, 'there are no fights here...' Mr Middleton is surprised to discover a very young student from a "special class" was responsible. The four kids in this class are - exceptional. Each forming a hive mind, that keeps the students and teachers in the school calm and focused thanks to the medication provided by an undercover government experiment. The result is that these socially under-developed children force any wrongdoers to pay for their actions with murderous results. When the deaths start being uncovered, Mr Middleton begins investigating and unravels a ...

movies.title: Pledge
movies.summary: A group of college freshmen pledge an exclusive fraternity but soon realize there's more at stake than they could have ever imagined.
movies.description_full: A group of college freshmen pledge an exclusive fraternity but soon realize there's more at stake than they could have ever imagined.
